entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 18. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Fog patches developing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 18. Wind chill near minus 25. Forecast issued 7:57 PM CST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of light snow. High minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow in the morning and early in the afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 7:57 PM CST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 14. POP 30%
